text: The RT-2PM2 «Topol-M» (, NATO reporting name: SS-27 "Sickle B", other names: SS-27 Mod 1, RS-12M1, RS-12M2, formerly incorrectly RT-2UTTKh)RS-12M1/2 Topol-M (SS-27/RT-2PM2) (Russian Federation), Offensive weapons is one of the most recent intercontinental ballistic missiles to be deployed by Russia. It is the first to be made after the fall of the Soviet Union. It was designed from the RT-2PM Topol mobile intercontinental ballistic missile. == References == == Other websites == * CSIS Missile Threat - SS-27 (Topol-M) * Federation of American Scientists * GlobalSecurity.org on the RT-2UTTH Topol-M (SS-27) * Representation video of a mobile Topol-M on Youtube * RS12-M2 "Topol-M/Тополь-М" Launch from Silo Category:Missiles
title: RT-2PM2 Topol-M
